pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)2 Pea, 2 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 1 Sproutling, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 175 Sun value.

pages.title: Barriers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Pea-nuts can shoot peas and block zombies.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Tall. Top Pea(above 45 HP) hits Flying. Bottom Pea is Low Profile. Both have 10Â° projectile deviation.
$(br)$(#bd951a)Pea-nut knows that some folks have an allergy to him. He tries to be sensitive to their concerns and give them the space they need. Still, he can't help but miss the old days.
